types.name: VRTK_BaseGrabAttach
types.summary: The Base Grab Attach script is an abstract class that all grab attach script inherit.

types.name: VRTK_BaseJointGrabAttach
types.summary: The Base Joint Grab Attach script is an abstract class that all joint grab attach types inherit.

types.name: VRTK_ChildOfControllerGrabAttach
types.summary: The Child Of Controller Grab Attach script is used to make the grabbed object a child of the grabbing object upon grab.

types.name: VRTK_ClimbableGrabAttach
types.summary: The Climbable Grab Attach script is used to mark the object as a climbable interactable object.

types.name: VRTK_CustomJointGrabAttach
types.summary: The Custom Joint Grab Attach script allows a custom joint to be provided for the grab attach mechanic.

types.name: VRTK_FixedJointGrabAttach
types.summary: The Fixed Joint Grab Attach script is used to create a simple Fixed Joint connection between the object and the grabbing object.

types.name: VRTK_RotatorTrackGrabAttach
types.summary: The Rotator Track Grab Attach script is used to track the object but instead of the object tracking the direction of the controller, a force is applied to the object to cause it to rotate.

types.name: VRTK_SpringJointGrabAttach
types.summary: The Spring Joint Grab Attach script is used to create a simple Spring Joint connection between the object and the grabbing object.

types.name: VRTK_TrackObjectGrabAttach
types.summary: The Track Object Grab Attach script doesn't attach the object to the controller via a joint, instead it ensures the object tracks the direction of the controller.
